22-1377.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes for the Federal Legislation Committee meeting held Wednesday, February 2, 2022A motion was made by Vice Chair Supernaw, seconded by Member Saro, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Saro, Supernaw and RichardsonPage 1 of 3411 W. 22-1378.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a presentation from the City’s federal legislative representative, Dentons, on the 2022 legislative year and the City’s advocacy efforts.John Russell, Dentons, spoke.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke.Chair Richardson spoke.John Russell, Dentons, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Richardson and John Russell, Dentons.Councilwoman Saro spoke.John Russell, Dentons, spoke.Chair Richardson spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Richardson and John Russell, Dentons.Vice Chair Supernaw spoke.John Russell, Dentons, spoke.A motion was made by Member Saro, seconded by Vice Chair Supernaw, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Saro, Supernaw and Richardson3.

22-1379.summary: Recommendation to receive and file staff recommendations for the City’s 2023 Federal Legislative Agenda, gather input from the Federal Legislation Committee, and forward the Committee’s recommendations to the City Council for adoption.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke; and presented the staff report.Chair Richardson spoke.Page 2 of 3411 W.
